question: 強烈
sourceMnemonic: Things that are <kanji>strong</kanji> and <kanji>intense</kanji> are <vocabulary>strong</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>intense</vocabulary> (the "strong" meaning is more along the lines of the "intense" meaning, so not so much like my muscles are super muscly and strong).
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
